page.title: 07Games in 1985 continued
page.content: seeker sees a child he has to run to a designated post, touch it and shout "Blocky 1.2.3.", the person's name and where they are hiding. They then have to help find the others. {Creep Mouse.}Someone stands with their back to the children as they try to creep up to them but if they are seen they go back to the beginning. {Off Ground Touch.}This is played with any number of players. Someone is on it and if you are touched on normal ground level you are on it and the other person is not. {Budge}is like Off Ground Touch, one person is on it and the others find a place off the ground. One person per site. When you go to someone elses place you must say "Budge" and they have to move to another perch without getting touched. Alison Watt and Shelley Rathbone.
